casebody.data:
Monday, December 21, 1992

MOTION DOCKET

92-847. State v. Lessin.

Cuyahoga County, No. 61106. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for permission to leave Cuyahoga County to visit appellant’s parents in California,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that said motion be, and the same is hereby, denied, effective December 18, 1992.

Douglas and Weight, JJ., dissent.
